subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer will play David Nalbandian in the final of the Madrid Masters today. Federer beat Nicolas Kiefer yesterday, 6-4, 6-4, and Nalbandian beat Novak Djokovic, 6-4, 7-6 (4).
snippet: Roger Federer will play David Nalbandian in the final of the Madrid Masters today. Federer beat Nicolas Kiefer yesterday, 6-4, 6-4, and Nalbandian beat Novak Djokovic, 6-4, 7-6 (4).
